name: Ideas
body:
###Ideas For Hackathons  

Browse through the list of available ideas choose one.  

**Build** one.  

Push to our codeserver.  

Notify [us](mailto:abhishek@campushash.com).  

For doubts and discussions ping on <abhishek@campushash.com> or the google group.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
